p.strong: Seniors at The Phoenix School and Empowerment High School are invited to complete the scholarship application.
Important Information: Southwest Schools will continue the suspension of normal operations through Friday, May 1st.
Enroll your student now for the 2019-2020 school year!
Chevron Grant helps expand Project Lead The Way at Southwest Schools.
Are you passionate about education, committed to the success of students, and desire to make a positive difference in education?
We are pleased to announce that Southwest Schools Empowerment High School is one of four schools selected to receive part of $1 Million Grant.

div.div:
Thank You to Our Sponsors!
Interested in sponsor and volunteer opportunities?
LEARN MORE
DONATE NOW

p.strong: While the district is closed in an effort to protect our community from the spread of COVID-19, we expect our students to continue learning at home with the remote support of our teacher and support personnel.

p.span: Students will receive direct communication and instruction from their teachers through a virtual learning platform and/or teacher developed packets. Each campus in the district will communicate with families the virtual platform that will be utilized campus wide. Through the platform parents/students can find support videos, documents and resources. The school’s virtual platform and other instructional software programs can be accessed online through Classlink.

Teachers will communicate directly with families and students with specific information regarding their classes and required lessons for students. Resources will be updated frequently for families to access additional activities to support the lessons assigned by their teachers. It is important for parents and caregivers to monitor this work so that learning is on-going as we wait to re-open schools.

p.strong: Mientras el distrito está cerrado a razón del esfuerzo por proteger a nuestra comunidad de la propagación de COVID-19, esperamos que nuestros alumnos continúen aprendiendo en casa con el apoyo remoto de los maestros y personal.

div.p: Alumnos recibirán comunicación e instrucción directamente de sus maestros por una plataforma virtual de aprendizaje y/o paquetes creado por el/la maestro(a). Cada plantel en el distrito comunicará con las familias que plataforma virtual utilizarán. Por la plataforma padres/alumnos pueden encontrar apoyo por videos, documentos y recursos. Tendrán acceso a la plataforma virtual escolar y otros programas instruccionales por Classlink.

Los maestros se comunicarán directamente con los alumnos y sus familias referente a la información específica de sus clases y las lecciones requeridas para los alumnos. Los recursos se actualizarán con frecuencia para que las familias accedan a actividades adicionales para apoyar las lecciones asignadas por sus maestros. Es importante que los padres y cuidadores monitoreen este trabajo para que el aprendizaje continúe mientras esperamos volver a abrir las escuelas.

Southwest Schools is a choice-based Texas education district with an understanding that true learning is not based on standardized testing or college entrance, but on offering a fulfilling educational experience that can be adjusted for each student.

We understand a successful education is one where boundaries are overcome, opportunities are experienced and possibility is realized. Regardless of how a student got here, from the day they start at Southwest Schools we rally around them with the promise of acceptance, encouragement and success.
Where will Southwest Schools take you?

link.script: if ( typeof soliloquy_slider === 'undefined' || false === soliloquy_slider ) {soliloquy_slider = {};}jQuery('#soliloquy-container-3223').css('height', Math.round(jQuery('#soliloquy-container-3223').width()/(613/352)));jQuery(window).load(function(){var $ = jQuery;var soliloquy_container_3223 = $('#soliloquy-container-3223'),soliloquy_3223 = $('#soliloquy-3223');soliloquy_slider['3223'] = soliloquy_3223.soliloquy({slideSelector: '.soliloquy-item',speed: 400,pause: 20000,auto: 1,useCSS: 0,keyboard: true,adaptiveHeight: 1,adaptiveHeightSpeed: 400,infiniteLoop: 1,mode: 'fade',pager: 1,controls: 1,nextText: '',prevText: '',startText: '',stopText: '',onSliderLoad: function(currentIndex){soliloquy_container_3223.find('.soliloquy-active-slide').removeClass('soliloquy-active-slide').attr('aria-hidden','true');soliloquy_container_3223.css({'height':'auto','background-image':'none'});if ( soliloquy_container_3223.find('.soliloquy-slider li').size() > 1 ) {soliloquy_container_3223.find('.soliloquy-controls').fadeTo(300, 1);}soliloquy_3223.find('.soliloquy-item:not(.soliloquy-clone):eq(' + currentIndex + ')').addClass('soliloquy-active-slide').attr('aria-hidden','false');soliloquy_container_3223.find('.soliloquy-clone').find('*').removeAttr('id');soliloquy_container_3223.find('.soliloquy-controls-direction').attr('aria-label','carousel buttons').attr('aria-controls', 'soliloquy-container-3223');soliloquy_container_3223.find('.soliloquy-controls-direction a.soliloquy-prev').attr('aria-label','previous');soliloquy_container_3223.find('.soliloquy-controls-direction a.soliloquy-next').attr('aria-label','next');},onSlideBefore: function(element, oldIndex, newIndex){soliloquy_container_3223.find('.soliloquy-active-slide').removeClass('soliloquy-active-slide').attr('aria-hidden','true');$(element).addClass('soliloquy-active-slide').attr('aria-hidden','false');},onSlideAfter: function(element, oldIndex, newIndex){},});});
